name: Fuji Xerox DocuWorks File
summary: An XDW file is a file saved in the DocuWorks proprietary image format used by Fuji Xerox DocuCentre scanners and copiers. It may contain both images and text, which includes scanned text that may be converted to actual characters using DocuWorks OCR technology and searched like a word processing document. XDW files may also store links to webpages or other documents.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Xerox DocuWorks or DocuWorks Viewer Light
